title: FPS Drop lately
body:
Hello everyone! I have a question, but please reply with no flaming:)

Lately i've been getting fps drops after 15 minutes, it goes from 150-200 to around 30, but I don't know what's wrong, so if anyone could help me, I would happily appreciate it:D

BTW,

I have a 1080TI
i7-7700k
16 gb ram
And lots of good coolers
so the problem is not the pc.

replies.body:
> I have a 1080TI
> i7-7700k
> 16 gb ram
> And lots of good coolers
> so the problem is not the pc.

Actually it cold be and probably is. CPU could be overheating or downclocking due to damage/incorrectly seated cooler. RAM could be underclocked, GPU could be in a slow PCIe slot.

On to software: OS or drivers could be causing issues independent of hardware, and so could software like an overlay or antivirus. The game itself could also be corrupted due to drive damage or a failed patch.
